nodes.text: A Hero Seeks Not Vengeance was a roleplaying-game adventure in year five of the Living Force campaign. It was the third adventure in the Heart of Evil trilogy and was written by Ron Heintz and edited by Margaret Heintz.
Following the destruction of the Almas Academy, the heroes travel to Coruscant to confront the man responsible for it, the Dark Jedi Garth Ezzar.
